subject: Order SSN3415
description_text:
Hi

My order SSN3415 arrived today, but the incorrect handle came with my
handbrake, I ordered the extended handle and you have sent the stand one,
can you please send the correct extended handle that I paid for

conversations.body_text: Hi Nick van Drongelen,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will promptly send you the correct replacement.

Hi, the m10x85mm allen head bolt is also bent making the handbrake jam up
can you please send spare bolts

On Mon, 8 Dec 2025, 11:14 pm support@simsonn.com,

It's not just the allen key bolt the bracket is bent too.its really stiff
and grinding sounds when you use it. I've only used the handbrake for 30min

I think you need to replace the whole handbrake
Under warranty

Please respone ASAP
Hi Nick van Drongelen,     Are you using the standard Rally pedals? Normally, it’s rare for them to bend after only a short period of use.

Pedals? It's the hb pro handbrake and been using it for drifting

On Sat, 13 Dec 2025, 7:19 pm support@simsonn.com,

Hi, what is happening? This order has been a headache from the beginning.
Took a month to ship, sent the wrong handle and now the handbrake
doesn't work.

Hi Nick van Drongelen,    We apologize for the delayed response. We will contact our support team as soon as possible to resolve this issue for you and arrange for the necessary replacement to be sent to you.

Hi Nick van Drongelen,    This is your long-handle logistics tracking number. We will resend this sensor and this bolt for you based on the support team's recommendation.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2534300707801366
Our warehouse staff has directly reissued the entire handbrake for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2534300707801366

So you are sending a whole new handbrake?

On Thu, 18 Dec 2025, 3:18 pm support@simsonn.com,
Can I have the tracking number for the handbrake please
Hi Nick van Drongelen,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2534300707801366

This is only the handle as it was shipped on the 11th.
Where is the tracking number for the replacement handbrake

On Thu, 18 Dec 2025, 11:51 pm support@simsonn.com,
Hi Nick van Drongelen,    We had intended to send a long handle, but upon confirmation yesterday, the warehouse staff sent the entire handbrake instead.
